title: Organic Cotton A-Line Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of an organic cotton A-line midi dress, short puff sleeves, square neckline, soft pastel color blocking in blush pink and ivory, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, isolated on plain white background
techpack: Organic cotton poplin A-line midi dress with short puff sleeves, square neckline, contrast topstitching, side seam pockets, and invisible back zipper. Color blocked panels in blush pink and ivory with soft sage accents. Seam allowance 1cm, pre-shrunk fabric, overlocked internal seams.
provenance: Inspired by the commercial viability and comfort of cotton fabrics, designed for breathable everyday wear.
design_text:
Organic Cotton A-Line Midi Dress (COT2024-001)
Colors: Blush Pink, Ivory, Soft Sage
Fabrics: Organic Cotton Poplin
Prints/Patterns: Solid Color Blocking
Garment Type: Dress
Silhouette: A-Line
Sleeves: Short Puff Sleeves
Neckline: Square Neckline
Length: Midi
Style / Fit: R, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , F, i, t
Trims & details: Contrast topstitching, Side seam pockets, Invisible back zipper
Techpack: available
